name: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Lightsaber Duels
name_original: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Lightsaber Duels
description: Now everyone can experience the fun and excitement of a Lightsaber fight. Star Wars The Clone Wars: Lightsaber Duels and Star Wars The Clone Wars: Jedi Alliance immerses you in the characters, locations, and epic duels from the all-new Star Wars animated feature film and television series set between Episode II and Episode III.
